title: Liakada Adult Womens High-Waisted Non-Restrictive Bike Short!
features: This was made for the more modest active goer. Our biker shorts feature a longer inseam and the same high waisted cut to keep everything in place. Made with our non-restrictive nylon and spandex blend, it will keep you covered from pointe-to-pointe.
This product has been made with our signature Supplex material. It provides the flexibility of spandex with the coverage of cotton all in one fabric
Ready for embroidery, screen printing, heat transfers, sublimation and rhinestone applications, this high quality fabric is perfect for team sportswear, company wear, or just personal wear.
